评论详情: Im 5’5” and about 130 and got the medium. Great for summer and wearing to work. I’m a teacher and my teacher friends think it’s cute too.
Receive lots of compliments. Easy to pack for traveling.
I am 5”6’ and this dress hit me at a weird unattractive length.

The color is great and fits good. However; I don't like the neck part. It has a wrap design that goes to the empire waist line. It's completely open. It does have a tiny clear snap about half way up but it does little good. I'll have to wear a shirt under it. Sleeves are beautiful. It's way too long and the material is so thin! I'm afraid I can wear it to church! Feels like it may wrinkle but I'm sending it back and can't wash it.

Love the colors! The structured shoulders and flowy design are very flattering. The material is a little thicker, but still breathable. I do not like the positioning of the upper seam across the chest or buttons. I had to remove the buttons and use a safety pin higher on the top because they were in an awkward spot. Overall the dress was a win for a Thanksgiving outfit that looked nice for hosting, but comfortably allowed extra room for pumpkin pie! ;)

I love this dress. It packs well. It is cute and comfortable. I live in a hot climate so I did cut the sleeves and put elastic in them making them  short sleeved  and slightly puffy. This works better for me. I receive lots of compliments on this dress. I bought the pink.
I'm hard to fit, i'm 4"11 and 150ish pounds and i got the medium and it fits perfect. Hits me right at the ankles. Super cute and soft.
Super cute and comfortable. Material is a bit thin but not see-through. Fits true to size. Great price

This dress is most definitely a BUY NOW  button to press.  Don’t even bother putting it in your cart.  It is lovely.  It is comfortable, the material was just the right thickness.  At the time I purchased and wore this dress I was 5’7 and 185lbs.  My mother came to visit and had no idea I had put on so much weight.  The color is just beautiful. I wore white tennis shoes, without the back.  You could dress it up by wearing dressier shoes.  I could go on and on, but, I’m sure you have several reviews to read,  BUY NOW…… You won’t regret it.  I got the blue colored one…. Enjoy how beautiful you are going to look and feel in this dress!! 🥳

She wore it to her grand daughter's wedding and felt great the whole day! I'd definitely recommend! Young or older!
The size was tricky. The XXL was way too big and yet the XL was snug. I like the dress and it’s great for casual wear.

This dress fits true to size. I am 5 ft. tall and weigh 185, wearing a size 16/18 and I ordered the XXL and it was perfect. I could raise my arms and bend them without it being tight or snug at all and I have chubby upper arms. Dress came right to my ankles, but again I am short. If you're on the fence about it, I say get it. You will love it too.

This dress is amazing.  It was my first purchase and loved the vibrant colors and received so many compliments that I purchased another one, the blue one.  This is a lightweight dress and very flowy.  You can wear this to work, church or out shopping.  Everyone will be asking you where you got your dress!  This brand Dokotoo never disappoints, their dresses have always been a keeper.

Light and breezy! Loved it and so many compliments!

Loveiy

Beautiful and comfortable dress.  Only downfall was the button (only one) holder, broke the first time I wore it!  Kind of embarrassing being exposed in bust area while out and about!  Had to change and now need to repair before I can wear again.

I get compliments on this dress every time I wear it! Every time. The size is great. It is flowy and flattering. There is a snap in the cleavage to adjust the depth of the V. I don’t have a lot up top, so it was nice to reign in the fabric. I carry weight in my belly and this is so flattering. One thing to know—this is polyester. It doesn’t breathe. It isn’t comfortable in the heat for me. But it’s lovely for indoor wear.

Lovely material, floral pattern, style and great fit! After the first purchase I bought two more in different colors. So versatile! Can dress up, down, for many occasions. So comfortable, figure flattering and I highly recommend; will wear to church and waiting for the compliments to fly!
Runs really small!!
Bought this for a baby shower and loved how flowy and light the fabric felt. The print/color was perfect for springtime.
Flowy, comfortable, and gorgeous. Love the colors!  This is such a great dress!

This is my new favorite dress. I wore this today and I felt feminine and comfortable and beautiful. It is light and cool and I feel like I can wear it into the fall with boots. Great value and the fit is flattering.

I bought this dress in green, pink and sky blue.  Maybe because green is my favorite color, I loved the look, pattern, fit and style of it and can’t wait to wear it out!  There’s nothing wrong with the pink or sky blue colored dresses, they’re just not for me.  I would definitely recommend this dress!  I usually wear a size small but ordered a medium as sometimes dresses with a snap at the breast tend to pull.  I’m a 34C for reference
it,s ugly, and big enough to fit a 500 lb. woman, big mistake depending on desprictions.
This item was described as midi length. I am 5’4” and it drags on the floor. It also has insufficient closure on bodice front. Only one snap for a long opening.
This dress fit just right. The pattern and colors are beautiful.
The dress is lightweight for the summer. Does not have pockets which are needed for cell phone.

This dress is lightweight and flowy. Would be bump-friendly! I bought it thinking it would be nursing- friendly, but I would say it could be a little tricky. There is one plastic snap button and the rest is open, but it is a little higher up to be nursing friendly. I was able to pump with it on and I made it work. I’m 5’2” and weigh 135 and ordered the small. It is a little long on me, but I got a lot of compliments on it and it is comfortable.
Beautiful and fits perfectly!!
Fun, comfortable, pretty dress. I love to wear it to church.
I am not busty by any means and it was tight through my arms and chest. Did not lay or look right at all.

I have ordered a LOT of dresses off of amazon and I am pretty sure this one is my FAVORITE.  Love the colours of the flowers.  I got the white dress with the pink and light purple flowers.  Usually wear a med but ordered a small and it fits still really roomy.  I am not big chested so if you are you would not want to size down but for me the size down fit better.  I also ordered it in the pink but had to return it.  It was cute but just a bit too bright for me.

Love love love this fabric and dress! Very flattering. BUT, the neckline is cut wrong and the snap makes it worse. Gapping and too low without the snap. I am a sewist, but could not fix. As others mentioned, it is also tight at the bust. Had to return.

I made the mistake of not reading reviews prior to purchasing. The material is thick, and the pattern is beautiful and true to the listing images. However, the bust is very tight and the dress is very long. I’m 5’8” and it’s almost a maxi dress, I ordered my regular size medium and I cannot button the top. It fits with room everywhere else.

This is a great dress, very lightweight, comfortable. The only con, I do not have a large chest and snap closure wouldn’t stay, I ended up wearing a nude cami underneath for the event I purchased the dress for.

I found this from an influencer, and their angles of having their elbows at their waist makes it appear that they HAVE one. Maybe try it with a belt? Returning this.  5’6, 165 lbs.
